alert.note: Alert for West Slopes South Central Cascades and Passes (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 02 at 1:47AM PST until March 02 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Seattle
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM EARLY THIS MORNING TO 10 PM PST THIS EVENING ABOVE 1500 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 1500 feet. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 16 inches. * WHERE...Cascade mountains and valleys of Pierce and Lewis Counties, including the Crystal Mountain Ski Area, Paradise on Mount Rainier, Ashford, Randle, and Packwood. * WHEN...From 4 AM early this morning to 10 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on very difficult travel.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions in Washington state, call 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: West Slopes South Central Cascades and Passes
